name: ONYPHE_Threats
author: Pierre Baudry, Adrien Barchapt, Andrea Garavaglia, Davide Arcuri, James Atack
description: Retrieve threat data from ONYPHE threatlist category for a given ip, domain, or fqdn

configurationItems.name: key
configurationItems.description: Define the API key to use to connect the service

configurationItems.name: time_filter
configurationItems.description: Specify ONYPHE time filter to be used for searches (see https://www.onyphe.io/docs/onyphe-query-language)

configurationItems.name: auto_import
configurationItems.description: Automatically import artifacts as observables (risks, cves, assets, threats...)
